content.question: private static void recur(int n) { if (n != 0) { recur(n - 2); System.out.print(n + " "); } } What numbers will be printed as a result of the call recur(7) ?

choices.label: Many numbers will be printed because of infinite recursion.
No numbers will be printed because of infinite recursion.

content.answer: No numbers will be printed because of infinite recursion.

skill.text: 3.C: Determine the result or output based on code that contains procedural abstractions.
